elements.text:
As you're getting into the shower, you see a huge spider on the wall. You turn away for a second and look back and realize it's gone. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I decide to turn the water on.
I want to call someone to help me find the spider, but decide to just take my shower.
I want to spray bug spray everywhere, but decide to continue my shower routine since spray might do more harm than the spider.
I start to play some music.
